page.title: 06Much Wenlock Parish Church-2
page.content: {Much Wenlock Parish Church}has a{choir of about 8 men and quite a few ladies. There are also some girls but no boys. There are usually about 20 people in the choir during a Sunday service. The choir meets on Wednesdays at 7:30 to rehearse. Connected with the Church there is a {Thursday Club}for children. There is also a{Women's Organization}and a {Fellowship group}where people study the Bible. During the year, there is a{Church {Fete}to raise money for the Church. They hold a{Harvest Festival}and a {Harvest Supper.}During Lent, before Easter, study periods are held. At Christmas special services are held. There are two parades held every year at the Church. The biggest one is the {British Legion}parade. A{Civic}parade is held for every new Mayor.
